quotes.quote: Be the witness of your thoughts.
No one bears witness for the witness.
To be human you must bear witness to justice.
To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the Gods.
We are here to witness the creation and to abet it.
When you listen to a witness, you become a witness.
Witness your thoughts. Your thoughts are attachments.
Every believer is a witness whether he wants to be or not.
Creation lives, grows, and multiplies; man is but a witness.
Relax, let go. But remember only one thing: You are a witness.
You are now about to witness the strength of street knowledge.
History is the witness that testifies to the passing of time; it illumines reality, vitalizes memory, provides guidance in daily life, and brings us tidings of antiquity.
Writers obviously have to bear witness to the harsh face of the age.
Who has witnessed one free and unconstrained act of yours, has witnessed all.
You never know how much a man can't remember until he is called as a witness.
A credible witness to truth and to the values of the Gospel is urgently needed.
Remain a witness to your emotions as if from a great distance an eagles eye view .
Whenever we witness art in a building, we are aware of an energy contained by it.
Everyone has been a witness sometime - It doesn't change it if you don't believe.
Life isn't something you possess. It's something you take part in, and you witness.
Awake. Be the witness of your thoughts. You are what observes, not what you observe.
Your life is a witness to the world of a loving savior and His redemptive plan for man.
There is freedom when you realize that you are just a witness to all that is happening.
Photography is a witness against the mistaken opinion that art is an imitation of nature.
The witness of solid moral character to a righteous way of life must never be underestimated.
There is no witness so terrible and no accuser so powerful as conscience which dwells within us.
Learn to become more of a witness, create more watchfulness. Let each act, each thought, be seen.
Let everyone witness how many different cards fortune has up her sleeve when she wants to ruin a man.
We need to witness our own limits transgressed, and some life pasturing freely where we never wander.
To be a witness means to live in such a way that one's life would not make sense if God did not exist.
